explains: adj. 留心的；记住的；警觉的
wordGroup: mindful of 注意的；想着的

sentences.en: We must be mindful of the consequences of selfishness.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要留意自私自利的后果。

sentences.en: Mindful of the danger of tropical storms, I decided not to go out.
sentences.cn: 想到热带风暴的危险，我决定不出门。

sentences.en: Mindful of what the Fisherman had said, Pinocchio knew that all hope of being saved had gone.
sentences.cn: 皮诺乔听了渔夫的话，意识到得救的希望已经破灭了。
